name: On Guard (VELUDITO)
description:
On Guard is a simple puzzle game that the main objective is to position every single guard in the right location, however you can only move the guards indirectly through the general, that is in your total control.

Tutorial

-Use the arrows or WASD keys to move the general in the desired direction.

-You can not move towards the stones or outside the map.

-Place a guard in every square  to win the level.

-You can use the stones to modify the army formation.

Credits

Programation and Art made by me - Cesar Henrique.

Musics - "Bit Bossa" & "Intro" by Azureflux.

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Azureflux/Pocket_Boy
